Package hamlet.alexander.SpeakEasy

Class UserService

  • java.lang.Object
    • hamlet.alexander.SpeakEasy.UserService
  • @Service
public class UserService
extends java.lang.Object
    User DATA ACCESS OBJECT service layer. Object that interacts with user data coming in and out of the USER Collection in the Mongo Database. Applys minimal business logic to ensure correct formatting.
